name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: top quality thick cotton. Initially it seemed that it was too large but it shrank to a perfect fit after a wash.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Nice colour, fits well

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Great shirt nice and thick material like it says

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Good product everyday go for top very comfortable and better as they get washed

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: I have maybe 5-10 dickies t shirts. These heavyweight ones are my favourite. They just last, they are warm, they feel good, they look good. The price is right.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Great tee, nice thick weight cotton, good banding at the neck. Slightly oversized, I order down a size.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: I'm a big guy. I bought the XXL but it's ridiculously big. Go a size or 2 down. Good quality material though.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Own a few Dickies pocket tees and ordered a size up as I’d added a bit of muscle. Fit is quite boxy (as expected) and material is definitely more heavyweight than my other dickies pocket tees.Did not experience any shrinking after first wash and dry cycle (might be because I choose delicate setting)Love the earthy colour, I’ve bought worse tshirts at this price point. Bargain!

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Not 100% cotton. Actually a 50% cotton/polyester blend.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Great winter T-shirt... I'm still getting used to it; but I think it is ok. Doesn't feel soft against the skin. But it is ok

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: I know  these have a lot of positive reviews but I thought they were awful and dropped them off at the local op shop.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Pleased with it.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: This t-shirt is a bit bigger than a large.  I wear it, but not often.  I would imagine it would be great on colder days.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: It was somewhat medium weight compared to dickies heavyweight shirts. It was also unusually long. Feel like it was the wrong product, or a different dickies line than I'm used to buying.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Thick material and very high quality. Would be good for work but got it for casual wear.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: No issues, if you want a baggy/loose fit choose a size up. Although choosing your correct size is still quite roomy, and loose. Really just depends on what you want to achieve.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Heavy duty, quality tshirts

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Good quality, heavy weight, was a bit larger than expected, however after a hot wash and tumble dry, it shrank down a bit.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Good quality , good size ,good colour

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Absolutely perfect!

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Like style and colour but beware as it shrinks badly and is generous fit so would have to be for shorter guy and have a big aussie pot for this one.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: The description says 100% cotton but it is really cotton and polyester.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: I am very satisfied with this purchase because of the quality of the material, the roominess of the fit and the fact that it has a pocket for my glasses.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Wonderful product, heavy duty cotton and thick feel. The sizing runs extremely large. I ordered a 5XL and it's more like a 7 or 8 XL. Much larger fit then my many 5XL and 6XL shits I already own.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Fit is good. Quality is good. Pleased. I shall be buying something else from Dickies I have my eye on based on this tee shirt.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: great quality, thick wearable cotton  , size, length all perfect ,I can't fault this T shirt highly recommneded so much so I bought 4 more

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: My husband likes the fit! Has a good supporting pocket for his phone

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: I LIKE QUALITY. DICKIES MANUFACTURES QUALITY AND OFFERS A WIDE ARRAY OF COLORS. I HAVE USED DICKIES FOR MANY DECADES. CUSTOMER SATISFACTION WAS NEVER IN QUESTION ! I KNEW DICKIES FOR WHAT IT REPRESENTED : ITS HIGH QUALITY EPITOMIZES AMERICAN KNOW-HOW IN MANUFACTURING. STELLAR COMPANY.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Me gusta mucho esta marca por su confianza, sobriedad y que me va muy bien al estar trabajando...hasta me siento gringo

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: My husband owns this in 5 different colours.  He’s 6’1, 225lbs and a regular 2xl is too wide for him, but the length is good.  A regular xl is not long enough buts fits otherwise.  So for him the only properly fitting T-shirt has to be an Xl T and not many places have them and if they do the colours are not for him.  So this has been a life saver.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Disappointed on the whole bought a few of these. The neck line is just too loose nowadays it needs to be tighter. Only available from USA so not cheap but not really worth it in hindsight

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Nice t shirts - fit well and seem to be good quality.  I washed them before my husband wore them and they came out well.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Fits very well and feels very comfortable. Heavier fabric so it's more rugged than a typical t-shirt and as a result more durable. Highly recommend.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 September 2019

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: good shirts !!!!

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Unfortunately they shipped us charcoal coloured ones and I had ordered black.  But we kept them and will order black again.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: The fabric is heavy enough to keep you warm when cycling in cooler weather.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 31 May 2015

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Dit Nice, good textile

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Me quedo muy  bien esta amplia y larga

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Top !

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Great fabric and gitf

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Son perfectas, dickies siempre es calidad / precio

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Excelente calidad.Buenos materiales su tela es gruesa, no es ideal para estar bajo el sol, las mangas algo cortas pero en general estoy complacido

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: I have gone through several brands from Everlane to Uniqlo, this by far the best value to quality. It shipped out to SG quick, well packed, and fits perfectly. It runs large, for my 5'11" x 80kg frame, I usually wear a Large, but bought Medium. So far, I bought the classic colors, Black and White, but will get more after I wear them a few more times.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Diseño y tela excelente.  El tamaño es extraño. Muy reducido. No entendí.  Pero me gusta mucho.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: My son is over 6’6” fits great

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Fits good, feels good. love the heavyweight cotton

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Passform ist ideal vor allem perfekt wenn man kräftig gebaut ist.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: I like that there are no loose threads and it is high quality. I’m going to buy more🙂.

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Unfortunately the size was too large for me (174cm, 80kg). I was unable to return the item because the return window was too short (2 days after the arrival).

name: Dickies Men's Heavyweight Crew Neck Short Sleeve Tee
reviews: Well, you get what you pay for alright, and these T shirts are just the quality I've been looking for.
